## WorkspaceSvg.isVisible() method

Getter for isVisible

**Signature:**

```typescript
isVisible(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

Whether the workspace is visible. False if the workspace has been hidden by calling `setVisible(false)`<!-- -->.
